fields.name: indicator
fields.description: Indicator estimated by the GAMLSS model in the KiGGS study. `cimt`: carotid intima-media thickness.

fields.name: sex
fields.description: Sex as an explanatory variable for the GAMLSS model; `f` : female, `m`: male

fields.name: ageY
fields.description: Age in years as an explanatory variable for the GAMLSS model

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height in cm as an explanatory variable for the GAMLSS model

fields.name: P5
fields.description: KiGGS 5% reference percentile, specific on modeled variables

fields.name: P10
fields.description: KiGGS 10% reference percentile, specific on modeled variables

fields.name: P25
fields.description: KiGGS 25% reference percentile, specific on modeled variables

fields.name: P50
fields.description: KiGGS 50% reference percentile, specific on modeled variables

fields.name: P75
fields.description: KiGGS 75% reference percentile, specific on modeled variables

fields.name: P90
fields.description: KiGGS 90% reference percentile, specific on modeled variables

fields.name: P95
fields.description: KiGGS 95% reference percentile, specific on modeled variables
